Jennifer M. STRAW and Thomas P. Straw, Individually and As Co-Administrators of the Estate of Elijah C. Straw, Deceased; and Rowan J. Straw, a Minor, by and Through His Parents and Natural Guardians, Jennifer M. Straw and Thomas P. Straw

v.
Thomas P. Straw Petition of: Fayette Parts Service, Inc., Incorrectly Identified As National Automotive Parts Association - Napa Auto Parts t/d/b/a Napa No. 314 WAL 2018
No. 315 WAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. February 15, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 15th day of February, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
